author: nancymarinelli
body:
This branch contains the version 0 of the Trigger Primitive implementation for Ecal EB in PhaseII. It includes a modification in DataFormats/EcalDigi and two new packages in SimCalorimetry
Automatically ported from CMSSW_8_1_X #16577 (original by @nancymarinelli).
title: Tp phase ii v0
